entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
